it.essepuntato.earmark.core
Class Docuverse

java.lang.Object
  it.essepuntato.earmark.core.Docuverse
All Implemented Interfaces:
EARMARKItem, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StringDocuverse, URIDocuverse
public abstract class Docuverse
extends java.lang.Object
implements EARMARKItem

This class represents an abstract docuverse in the EARMARK model.

Author:
Silvio Peroni

          This enumeration describes all the possible types for docuverses.

setId

protected void setId(java.net.URI newId)
This method changes the local id of the docuverse with a new one. If the new id specified is equal to EARMARKDocument.reservedDocumentId, no change is performed.

Parameters:
newId - the new local id for the docuverse.
